title: News24.com | 'It's shocking how racist people are' - SA teacher in China on 'discrimination, forced quarantine' for Africans
description: A South African teacher who lives in China's Guangdong province says her family lives in constant fear of being subjected to forced quarantine and multiple Covid-19 tests.
content:
A South African teacher who lives in Shunde, Foshan, in the Guangdong province of China, says her family lives in constant fear of being subjected to forced quarantine and multiple Covid-19 tests. 
The primary school teacher, whose name is known to News24, l… [+5084 chars]
